Hero.title:
Computer Engineering
Student & Game Dev.
Hero.subtitle: I build things that work. Into web dev, clean code, and practical solutions.

Resume.about: I am a second-year Computer Engineering student from Tripoli, Libya. I have a passion for Game Development (Godot/C#) and software architecture. I also work as a freelance English teacher and have led robotics teams to international competitions.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.subtitle: I'm currently open to collaborative projects and opportunities in software development. Feel free to reach out!
Contact.availabilityText: Currently studying at Kocaeli University. Most responsive via email.

Projects.title: Selected Work
Projects.subtitle: A collection of projects exploring web systems, hardware, and design.
Projects.noResults: No projects found for this category.
